name: claim_bounty
attributes: # [doc = " SPLトークンで報酬を支払うが、"]
# [doc = " has_one = owner, has_one = reward_vault のみ検証され、"]
# [doc = " 本来必要な has_one = claimant_token_account（または claimant Pubkey）の照合が抜けているため、"]
# [doc = " 攻撃者が他人のアカウントを指定して報酬を横取り可能"]
body: let bounty = & mut ctx . accounts . bounty_account ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . reward_vault . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . claimant_token_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . owner . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " バウンティを発行したオーナー（署名者、かつ報酬Vault権限）"]

fields.name: reward_vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬が保管されたトークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: claimant_token_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬を受け取るユーザーのトークンアカウント（所有者照合なし）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: claimant
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来報酬を受け取るべきユーザー"]
